docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 26 (Reuters)--A statue of President Franklin D. Roosevelt in Montevideo was destroyed by explosives planted by terrorists today, the Uruguayan Interior Ministry announced.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 26 (Reuters)--A statue of President Franklin D. Roosevelt in Montevideo was destroyed by explosives planted by terrorists today, the Uruguayan Interior Ministry announced.
docs.abstract: Statue of President Franklin D Roosevelt in Montevideo, Uruguay, is destroyed by explosives planted by terrorists (S)
